mapper.sql: id, created, creator_id, `function`, work_content, elc, project_name, `date`, is_mail_push, is_tel_push
mapper.select: select `user`.id, `user`.created, `user`.modified, `user`.locked, `user`.loginid, `user`.password, `user`.username, `user`.email, `user`.leaderEmail, `user`.city_id from user_has_msg inner join `user` on user_has_msg.user_id = `user`.id where user_has_msg.msg_id=#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from message where 1=1
and (message.creator_id=#{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} or exists (select id from user_has_msg where user_id=#{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and msg_id=message.id))
mapper.insert: insert into message (creator_id, `function`, work_content, elc, project_name, `date`, is_mail_push, is_tel_push) values (#{creator.id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{function, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isMailPush, jdbcType=BIT}, #{isTelPush, jdbcType=BIT})
insert into user_has_msg (user_id, msg_id) values (#{receiver.id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgId, jdbcType=INTEGER})
